attributes.action: Not use our military bases to house refugees who entered our country illegally.
attributes.additional_details:
Military bases are old heritage which helps us remember our fallen heroes and teaching future generations. NOT housing. Using them undermines their purpose and heritage.

Our soldiers did not fight and die for this country to end up the way it has, and especially to have their bases took over by asylum seekers.
attributes.background: Stop using military bases to house asylum seekers. These sites are for remembering our fallen heroes, teaching and honouring service, not residential use. The Government should find suitable civilian or purpose-built accommodation that meets needs while preserving our military heritage.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Stop asylum seekers being given housing in military establishments 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/748431
